ValidationRule.description: Only Enterprise Service should be allowed to change certain Case Statuses
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND (
ISCHANGED( Status ),
RecordTypeId = '0121i000000Trq0AAC',
OR(
NOT($Profile.Name = "Telia Enterprise Service"),
NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"),
NOT($Profile.Name = "Telia Enterprise Customer Service")),
OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Gather Information"),
ISPICKVAL(Status, "Delivery"),
ISPICKVAL(Status, "Contract Compliance"),
ISPICKVAL(Status, "Close Case"),
ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed")
) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to move the Case to this Status
